channel.title: [508] Help with to No-Ip
channel.description:
I am trying to run a 508 Server. I ran the Server and could connect using RSPS Client (192.168.1.1), but when I use my No-Ip [desertscape.no-ip.biz], it does not connect. The [B][U]problem is not with the server or cache[/U][/B] because when I connect using Hamachi it worked. I have also forwarded port 43594. Since Hamachi is Highly not Recommended I would like to use No-IP, but it gives [B]error js5_game_connect[/B].
[B]Operating System[/B] - Windows Vista Ultimate [B]FireWall [/B]- Windows and Bit-Defender [B]Modem + Router[/B] - Beetel 450BXI ADSL2 + Router
[U]Here are some Pictures that might help you Solve my Problem[/U]
No-IP Working
[IMG]http://oi44.tinypic.com/33uvojr.jpg[/img]
Cache
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1gt94w.jpg[/img]
Port Open
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/4lfvus.jpg[/img]
Server Running
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ltpjxc.jpg[/img]
Error
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/doml5c.jpg[/img]
The Server was run before client. No-IP was running. cache was installed and Port Forwarded. There Seems to a problem with No-IP since I could connect using Hamachi.
Please Help! Thanks in Advance![code=c_mac][/code]

item.title: [508] Help with to No-Ip
item.dc:creator: @Master_Aditya Master Aditya
item.description:
@Master_Aditya wrote:

Sir,

Could you please tell me more clearly about the No-IP, other people cant connect, leave blank?
I did not Understand. Sorry, I am new to private Servers.

Thanks in Advance![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2009, 11:35:45 am[/size][hr]Its been 2 days and I am not Able to Solve It.
I cant connect even using another computer with IP Changer Client.

Thanks in Advance![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2009, 11:38:23 am[/size][hr]

Sir,

I connected using my IP from another Computer but it does not work, it stops at Connecting to Update Server and gives error js5_game_connect.

Please Help Me!
Thanks in Advance

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Help with to No-Ip
item.dc:creator: @_Dro †Dro†
item.description:
@_Dro wrote:

well first ,its 10 times easier to use a 508 ipchanging client. so get a ipchanging client, and if your the one hosting, when you start the client, and it has which ip to use, just use blank like this.

if you dont have one sure you can find it here ;D www.google.com . Don’t change you ip, on no-ip. just leave the clients ip blank. or other people cannot connect to your server.

hope it helped ;D

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Help with to No-Ip
item.dc:creator: @Master_Aditya Master Aditya
item.description:
@Master_Aditya wrote:

[quote=“Majin Buu, post:3, topic:267042”]i’m not so familiar with 508+ but i think thats coz the client has trouble connecting to the update server.
if you downloaded the source make sure you have changed all the adresses to your ones.[/quote]

How do we Change the Address?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Help with to No-Ip
item.dc:creator: @Master_Aditya Master Aditya
item.description:
@Master_Aditya wrote:

I am trying to run a 508 Server. I ran the Server and could connect using RSPS Client (192.168.1.1), but when I use my No-Ip [desertscape.no-ip.biz], it does not connect. The problem is not with the server or cache because when I connect using Hamachi it worked. I have also forwarded port 43594. Since Hamachi is Highly not Recommended I would like to use No-IP, but it gives error js5_game_connect.

Operating System - Windows Vista Ultimate
FireWall - Windows and Bit-Defender
Modem + Router - Beetel 450BXI ADSL2 + Router

Here are some Pictures that might help you Solve my Problem

No-IP Working

Cache

Port Open

4lfvus.jpg857×329

Server Running

Error

The Server was run before client. No-IP was running. cache was installed and Port Forwarded. There Seems to a problem with No-IP since I could connect using Hamachi.

Please Help!
Thanks in Advance!
